shrimp.name: Tile
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: xfreq
input.description: The frequency of the tiling in the x direction

input.name: yfreq
input.description: The frequency of the tiling in the y direction

output.name: xt
output.description: The x coordinate inside the tile

output.name: yt
output.description: The y coordinate inside the tile

output.name: column
output.description: The column number of the current tile

output.name: row
output.description: The row number of the current tile

shrimp.usage: This function takes a point X,Y and returns the coordinates inside the tile ("xt","yt") and the tile "column" and "row", with "xfreq" and "yfreq" affecting the frequency (and consequently the shape) of the tiles in the X and Y directions.
